snippet: The police said the man had lunged for an officer’s weapon, but family members contended he had been lying on the ground when he was shot three times.
abstract: Los Angeles Police Dept reports that an unarmed black man was shot and killed by police in South Los Angeles after he tackled an officer and lunged for weapon in his holster; police do not identify victim, but family members say his name is Ezell Ford and that he had mental health problems that were well known to police.
lead_paragraph: The police said the man had lunged for an officer’s weapon, but family members contended he had been lying on the ground when he was shot three times.

headline.main: Man Is Shot and Killed by the Police in California
headline.print_headline: Man Is Shot and Killed by the Police in California
